issue.title: Gezbo in apt repositories is not compatible with any drcsim package.

content.raw:
You are right, compatible ros-gazebo-pkgs should be released really soon. You can check [this issue]() to know how is the progress on this.

Meantime, you have a couple of options:

1. Stay on version drcsim-3.0 until the new release, see [instructions](http://gazebosim.org/wiki/DRC/Install/3.0)
2. Install gazebo-2.0.0 and install from source the rest of the software stack: ros-gazebo-pkgs, osrf-common, sandia-hand and drcsim. I would recommend using a catkin workspace for this. Let me update the documentation for this, I will comment with updates.
content.html:
You are right, compatible ros-gazebo-pkgs should be released really soon. You can check this issue to know how is the progress on this.

Meantime, you have a couple of options:

  1. Stay on version drcsim-3.0 until the new release, see instructions
  2. Install gazebo-2.0.0 and install from source the rest of the software stack: ros-gazebo-pkgs, osrf-common, sandia-hand and drcsim. I would recommend using a catkin workspace for this. Let me update the documentation for this, I will comment with updates.
